## Plantering

Gropen
När

Läge: Sol till halvskugga / medelfuktigt. 

Sweet cheery trees prefer a full sun position, acidic ones will be fine in partial shade.

"lanteras i väldränerad, kalkrik och mullrik jord. Gräv en stor grop och se till att jordkvaliteten är bra även runt planteringsgropen. Gödslas med kvävefattig gödsel, t.ex. Algomin Trädgårdsgödsel."

Both types prefer a well drained, roughly neutral soil

## Näring

Trädgårdsgödsel

## Bevattning

Vattna rikligt under torra somrar

## Beskärning

Putsa lätt och beskär i juli – september ( jas )
Klipp bort skadade, korsade och inåtväxande grenar

## Höjd

Starkväxande: 5 till 7 m
Medelstarkväxande: 4 till 6 m
Buske: 150-300 cm.

## Odling

Cherry trees are low maintenance although they can suffer from aphids in particular. Birds can eat the fruits but in almost all cases enough is left undamaged for a large crop.

## Insektsbekämpning

<!-- Pesticides, and in particular insecticides, can be harmful to pollinators. Most pesticide labels advise against their use during crop bloom for this reason. If an insecticide must be used during bloom, be sure to follow label directions and apply the pesticide when bees are least active, and so that the pesticide will dry before bees come into contact with flowers that have been exposed to it. For example, an application made at dusk or during the night will do the least harm to pollinators who visit flowers during the day. After the crop has finished blooming, be aware that pesticide drift onto non-crop flowering plants in adjacent habitat can harm pollinators on those flowers. -->
